GSD.description:
udmabuf: Set the DMA mask for the udmabuf device (v2)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.65 by commit e658538c610c6047b3c9f552e73801894d9284b1. For more details please see the references link.
